ui.follower tooltip: The Follower knows who the Insider is, but doesn't know the secret word. Wins together with the Insider.
ui.follower instructions: You win together with the Insider!
ui.follower variant used: You are playing with the follower variant
ui.play with the follower variant: The Follower (for 6 or more players): The Follower knows who the Insider is, but doesn't know the secret word. Wins together with the Insider.
ui.play with the all-insiders variant: Eveyone is an Insider: There's a slim chance everyone is an Insider. You all win if each player votes for himself.
ui.all insiders variant used: You are playing with the all-insiders variant
ui.all insiders tooltip: Are the others players really good, or do everyone know the secret word? it might get tricky to not expose yourself!
ui.invalid access code: Sorry, no game was found with the access code you provided!
ui.footer: Application based on the Fake Artist Goes to New-York meteor application: https://fake-artist.herokuapp.com
ui.Author: Found a Bug? got a Suggestion? send me a PM on BGG:
ui.enter category: enter the category for the word
ui.let us choose: or let us choose it for you
